messages.content: Hello, HPD. How can I help you?
We got a pursuit going on. It's heading towards us.
Uh-oh, okay. What vehicle are you pursuing?
It's a white Bonneville, occupied by two white females.
They went through the gate close to Martin Road.
Okay, a white Bonneville went through the Martin Road gate, occupied by two white females. Do you have a license plate?
Got it. Are you still pursuing them?
Yes, one of our unmarked units, our narcotics guys, is following them.
Alright, I'll notify the units. Anything else you need?
No, just wanted to keep you informed.
Understood. Be safe out there. Bye.
